Name: Piece of hanging
Description: This fragment of a hanging from the excavations at Akhmim is made of undyed linen fabric decorated with pieces of polychrome wool and undyed linen tapestry. A wide variety of techniques have been used including dovetailed tapestry, interlocked tapestry and a woven fringe. The pattern on the fabric consists of lozenges of a stylized vegetal pattern including trees, baskets and star-shaped flowers.
